brief: public Figure findFigureInside(int x, int y);
sourceCode: public Figure findFigureInside(int x, int y);
full_method_info: /** * Finds a figure but descends into a figure's * children. Use this method to implement click-through * hit detection, that is, you want to detect the inner most * figure containing the given point. */ public Figure findFigureInside(int x, int y);
method_comment: * Finds a figure but descends into a figure's * children. Use this method to implement click-through * hit detection, that is, you want to detect the inner most * figure containing the given point.
